112.content:
Michelle wanted to become a veterinarian, and wanted to know all she could about animals. One day, after her biology class, one of the lab assistants, a girl named Chloe, came up to her. "Could I ask you to try a special new cream for me? I've seen how you've stared at the animals longingly in your vet classes. This cream will allow you know more than anyone has before about animals than ever before."

Michelle blinks cautiously and utters as she sips a soda, "Okay... What are you talking about?"

"See..." Chloe answered, "the cream can temporarily turn you INTO that animal for a short period of time."

Michelle scoffed at his claim. "Nonsense. You've been reading too much sci-fi. People can't turn into anim..a...l...s..." Michelle began to feel woozy, then fell out into Chloe's arms.


Flashback


Chloe puts rufies in Michelle's soda.

Flashback End



Hours later, Michelle woke up in a chair. "Wakey wakey..." Chloe tried to rouse Michelle. "It's time to test the cream!!" Michelle started becoming more aware, and saw Chloe nude. Moreso, Michelle saw a creamy goo on Chloe's groin. "What is this? What are you doing?!" she yelled.

"A live demonstration was the only way to prove it to you, and I wanted someone hear to see it... and ready to inject me with that syringe on that table over there in case I don't change back in six hours... I'm using a six hour formula, by the way."

"But why are you naked and wearing the stuff on your groin?" Michelle asked.

"Because, unfortunately, the only way it works, from my studies of earlier animal testing, is to put it on your genitals and have sex with the animal you want to become."

Michelle blushes and gags. "Um, ew, and weird to the max..." Chloe then pressed a button, and a Labrador Retriever walked into the lab. Chloe said, "It works by first copying your cell structure, then making it malleable, and then putting you into heat, generating a catch-all pheromone that attracts anything of the opposite gender, enticing you to seek out something to mate with to receive foreign DNA to change you. Thing is..." Chloe takes in a deep whiff of air, "...you become sexually attracted to ANYTHING that is the opposite gender, regardless of species. Right now, that dog is SO TURNING ME ON!!" She quickly got onto her hands and knees, and began coaxing the male dog to her rear. The male dog began smelling the pheromones the cream generated, and quickly lined himself up, and penetrated Chloe. "Oh god, yes!!" Chloe screamed, as the dog went to work.

At first, Michelle didn't see anything happening, but slowly, blonde fur began to grow on Chloe's rear and her hands and feet. It slowly crept over her as her legs began to shrink and pop into proper canine form, as her arms became proper canine forelegs. A tail snaked from Chloe's bum, tickling the dog's belly as she wagged it frantically in ecstasy. Her chest began to barrel out and overtake her breasts as three new rows of nipples emerged below her original set. "Arrr... Mooorrre..." Chloe moaned, her voice blurring into canine yelps of joy. Her hair began to shrink into her scalp and turn into fur as her skull crunched into a canine shape, muzzle growing out, her ears becoming long and floppy. Finally, Chloe howled in orgasm as the male dog finished atop her, her tongue panting away.

"Chloe?" Michelle asked, shocked to see the lab assistant was no liar after all, and amazed by the sight she had just witnessed. Chloe cocked her head, as though she recognized the name, but not all her human intellect was there. The male dog tried to dismount, but was knotted to Chloe, and when he tried, he yelped, and elicited a growl from Chloe. "Whoa, it works..." Michelle scratched her head, and saw the needle on the table, as well as the cream. "What do I do now?"
112.title: She could get closer to animals

1141.content:
Michelle never considered herself to be strange. She was a A- student in high school, had an ordinary number of friends, listened to roughly the same music as everybody else, and had only the vaguest ambitions for her future. She never knew what to say when people asked her what she wanted to be when she got out of college.

"Well," she'd always say, "I just want to be happy. I want to have friends and travel, and if I can get that, that's all that really matters." And people believed it. It was short, heartfelt, and utterly noncommittal. And truth be told, she meant it most of the time. She could be a doctor, or a journalist, or a lawyer, or anything. That's what she told herself.

But she knew what she thought about sometimes. A couple years ago, Michelle was invited to a party for seniors at her high school. Robert, one of the geeky older boys had taken a shine to her, and he was just cute enough for her to return the sentiment. She could hardly remember the night over the flashing lights, thumping music, and cheap-yet-unusually strong beer. But she did remember a little conversation. She could remember it oh so clearly.

"I mean, I think it's important to think about what the needs of other people," said Robert, "So I want to enroll in the Peace Corps. What do y-you want to do?" Michelle smiled.

"That's cute, Robert." The beer was getting to her, stripping away the lies she usually told to people.

"Y-you thin-think so?"

"Yeah. But you know what I want?"

"What?"

"I want to be big."

"Like, a-a-an actress or something?"

"No, Robert. I want to be big like a basketball star. Or a building. Or a skyscraper. Or a mountain. I don't really care which. I just want to be able to look down at people and feel them staring back at me like the goddess I would really be. I want to feel a man's entire body thrashing around inside my cleavage. I want to feel a bus beneath my bulging ass as I crush it. I want to feel a horde of people coating my building-sized clit as they writhe in worshipful bliss against it and as I writhe in ecstasy. I want to be so. Goddamn. Huge. And when I am that big? I want to find you and have all kinds of fun with you." She could remember Robert's face losing all of its color (in fear? Arousal? Both?) He had excused himself that night. That was alright. He probably wasn't used to hearing what a woman wanted. That's what women wanted, right? Michelle could never really guess; she had never talked about it with her friends. But she knew the thought sent blood rushing to her crotch every time she thought about it. The images of her bending over to avoid bumping her head on the ceiling (or holding a bus in her hands like a toy, or getting dizzy from the lack of oxygen in the stratosphere) drove her wild and kept her awake at night. She guessed it wasn't all that weird.

And besides, she thought as she entered her dorm for the first time, even if it was weird, nobody would have to know. She was living in a single, so nobody would have to hear her thoughts on the matter in her more lustful moments. Such lustful moments. They were beginning to occupy all of her attention since she had finished the drive to the school. She worried for a second, but put those worries aside. It was Saturday before the beginning of fall term. She had an entire day to herself tomorrow. Plenty of time to get this out of her system. She closed her eyes and fell asleep.

The next morning...

The lady offers her a job
1212121.content:
After a long day in College, Michelle was walking down the street towards her home, and along the way she spots a bakery. Never had she seen this place before, curious at what they had, she enters the bakery inside and says, "Um hello? Excuse me?"

The fat women behind the counter replies, "Ah my first customer! Say, would you like to sample a new batch of brownies, they are to die for."

"Well I usually don't, but these smell so good,” Michelle said. Taking a look at the brownies the woman was offering, Michelle suddenly couldn’t help herself, as the warm baked aroma smelled so heavenly in her nostrils; the smell was intoxicating.

“Maybe just one." Michelle took one from the plate and right away she can tell it was so gooey and heavy for its size. She takes a bite and the flavour explodes in her mouth with her eyes open wide from the taste. Quickly facing the woman behind the counter, Michelle shouted;

"Oh my god! This brownie is so yummy! Can I have more PLEASE!"

"Sure have as much as you want. My dear." The lady handed her the whole plate, thirty brownies!

Michelle started wolfing down one after another. As her mind was clouding up, thinking of nothing but the brownies she was devouring. Making a mess of herself, with crumbs and chocolate stains all over her top, hands and face. Eventually she finished eating all the brownies on the plate and immediately asked, "Can I have *UURRP* more please?” With a small belch, making her slightly blush in deep red.
1212121.title: A slob mind, is a special kind

choices: The fat woman next takes out multicolored frosted cupcakes.
The fat woman gives Michelle a belly rub, casually mentioning she can't leave.
12121211.content:
The fat woman behind the counter grinned, her sharp lipstick making her look like she was smirking. "Oh, of course! You're my first customer! I'm only gonna sell more from here!"

Michelle grinned like a giddy kid, drooling just a bit, until she pulled out her wallet. The only contents proved to be a few crumbs and a five dollar bill.

The fat lady leaned over to see, her enormously doughy belly pouring over the counter top. "Oh, shoot... Figures my first guest would be a broke college student." she said as Michelle stared back with big, sad eyes.

"Tell you what, hon'. You give me that five dollars, and you can eat aaaaaaaaanyting that you want while you're here. Y'know, like an all you can eat buffet." the fat lady said, hands on her blubbery hips. Michelle's eyes nearly popped out of her head.

"I-I dunno... My metabolism can't last forever, y'know..." A gurgle from Michelle's belly betrayed how tempted she was.

"Oh, exactly. So why fight the inevitable march of your wasteline, darling?", the fat lady hummed, scooching a nearby tray of brownies closer with her finger. The dense, borderline-musky odor of the brownies filled Michelle nose, her eyes nearly rolling back into her head. "O-Ohkay... just a fewww..." she drawled, handing the five-dollar bill to the fat woman with one hand, and scooping up a handful of the dripping-warm brownie with the other.


She sunk her teeth in. Chocolate gushed around every tastebud, and each chew drained so much energy from her; it was like trying to chew her way through liquid concrete! Liquid concrete made of cocoa and heaven. It slid down her throat with the same consistency, and hit her belly like an anvil. Uuugh, her belly felt like it had a dense little ball of lead in it. She sloppily licked the fudge off her hand, and grabbed another brownie without thinking with the same hand. The fat woman, beaming, didn't seem to mind.

The tray of brownies felt like it took an eternity to eat, and yet after it was done she numbly reached for another. The fat woman, who had left, returned with a glass in hand.

"Warm chocolate milk, darling. You'll need it after all those brownies."

"I get indigestion whenever I drink milk..." Michelle objected.
"Now, now. This is gourmet chocolate milk. You wouldn't want that to go to waste, would you?"

"I-I guess not..." Michelle said aloof, lifting the glass to her lips. She'd only meant to sip a bit, but she found herself refusing to move the glass away until she'd one-shotted the entire glass. After finishing, she groaned, and let loose a deep brassy belch.

"Oh, fuck, excuse me, I'm so sorry-" she groaned. Her belly felt rock-hard to the touch, and was starting to force her belly button to peek out from under her shirt. Yet, it felt so deeply warm, so pleasantly round and heavy~

And now, active. The fat lady could hear it churning and sloshing from where she was standing. She smiled, as though expecting it. "Oh, dear, what's wrong with me? You can't have milk without cookies!"


"Wha...?" Michelle began, before the fat woman near-instantly procured a plate of cookies and another glass of chocolate milk. "Please, they're an old family recipe!"


Couldn't say no to that, thought Michelle. She picked up a cookie (very dense, as the brownies), dunked it in the hot milk, and chewed. The chocolate chips felt like they were oozing between her teeth, oozing even to her pores, and the thick chewy cookie between was barely affected by the warm milk it had been dipped in.

The rest of the cookies went down her gullet in a similar fashion, along with the milk. Her stomach now stuck distinctly in front of every other part of her, and she occasionally began to absentmindedly bump her belly into the countertop. Her shirt was sprinkled in chocolate stains; a thin layer of fudge and drool lined her lower lip, and a chocolate-milk mustache lined her upper.

"Ohmigaaawd..." was all she could say. Her belly was too big, too warm, to stand anymore, and the food was so thick that just chewing it left her exhausted. The fat woman picked up on this, and briskly walked around the cash register. "Come, darling, I have a seat this way..."

Mmmm~ Sitting down was all she wanted to do. Her butt plopped heavily against the cushion, and Michelle exhaled deeply. She felt like she was in a hot fog...


Her belly angrily glorped and gurgled, a particularly loud noise announcing her wild indigestion. Without a thought in her head, she spread her legs open and- Phhhhhrrrrrppppt! let loose a deep, loud burst of gas. "Uuuugh... My belly hurts..."

The fat woman grinned, the way a spider might with a fly in its web.
12121211.title: The lady gives her more with a discount

1212122.title: The mind STILL continues to wonder...

The only thing she knows about this girl is that her name is Beth Schlock. So she plucks up her courage and takes the plunge by opening the worn down wood door. As it turns out when Beth was a little girl, her mother relised she was a lesbian and so she got up and left the family with out even saying good bye. Ever since then Beth has been dealing with a lot of abadonmint issues and feels uncomftible around gays and lesbians. "But I inset that you at least let me give you this." The old man said as he pulled out from his trench coat a gold necrice with a ruby heart. Rubbing agnist each other, sticking their hands in the others crotch, while liking and sucking each others nipples. It was a good thing that the necrice stoped any noise from leaving the room and also prevented any unwanted visitors.
The next morning Michell wakes thinking that the whole night before was just a dream, until she relises that she is neaked, lying in the bottom bunk with her head resing on Beth's boobs. She gets up with nothing but the necrice on, and takes a look around the room. She sees Beth's pitcures of hot guys all them well built and strong. She then just remeamebers what the old man said about changing shape to please both her true love, Beth, and her self. She always wanted to be muscular and strong, but she also hopes that she dosn't get much taller because she likes being shorter than Beth.

1553211.content:
Living in a country brimming with skinny people, Michelle found obesity fascinating. Seeing images of fat American women captivated her. Watching the tv display the wobbly asses of white women, their big boobs, their soft paunchy stomachs stirred arrousal in the slim girl. Unfortunately her home country fiercely discouraged Michelle from fattening up and being a shrine maiden, Michelle was pressured to be exceptionally slim. Michelle found hope in US college, if she transferred she could escape the strict demands of her home country and blossom into an obese version of herself like all of the fat American women.

Upon arrival, Michelle was immediately bombarded by the American lifestyle. Every woman was fat. Unlike the typical Japanese woman who comfortably fit in her clothes of which Michelle was accustomed to, American women were spilling out of their clothes. Bellies peeped out, muffintops oozed, and butt cracks crept out. These American women shamelessly stuffed their girthy physiques into ostensibly undersized attire. Further exciting the Japanese girl was how much the woman ate. American woman ate without a care, no matter how unhealthy, or how many calories as long as it tasted good, women ate it and without criticism.

Michelle could barely contain herself as she traversed this country of blubber. Finally Michelle could fatten herself up. She chuckled at the thought of how her family would react to her returning like a fat American girl.

Her college did not disappoint her as all of the female students were nice and fat. Vending machines were everywhere and the girls helplessly indulged from them. Michelle than begins her fat journey by...
